attributes.action: Government with the consent of the governed? Help prevent the closure of Brent libraries!
attributes.additional_details: As a result of the deficit and unavailable funding, the government is closing down our libraries in Brent. On behalf of the youth, these libraries are beneficial to our studies. Without our libraries, how does the government expect us to achieve our potentials of getting high grades? We at Brent believe the government should reduce spending on things that are less vital, not by closing down our libraries.
